reasoning: The test was checking view count display on a draft article, but the feature is designed to only work for published articles. This is an incomplete test setup issue, not a bug - the code review confirms view tracking is fully implemented and works correctly for published content.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows empty article detail page because the test article is in draft state. Code review confirms view count display (Article.ascx lines 71-73) and increment logic (ArticleContent.ascx.cs line 185) are properly implemented, but only activate for published articles per the SQL stored procedure Wiki_Article_UpdateViewCount.
scenario_id: Evoq.Social.Wiki::View Tracking::Test view count display on article view
